documentation.text:
@dev Refund the game to the player. To use only if some game is stuck.
 @param _nonce Nonce of the game

@dev Change the keepFees variable
 @param _keepFees New value for keepFees

@dev Change the token address, sending the current token balance to the admin wallet
 @param _token New token address

@dev Change the key hash for the gwei price on chainlink
 @param _keyHash New key hash

@dev Withdraw tokens from the contract to the admin wallet
 @param _amount Amount of tokens to withdraw

changeKeyHash(bytes32).details: Change the key hash for the gwei price on chainlink

changeLimitsAndChances(uint256,uint256,b.details: Change the house chance and bet limit

params._limitTypeFixed: if true, the bet limit will be fixed, if false, the bet limit will be a percentage of the contract balance

changeToken(address).details: Change the token address, sending the current token balance to the admin wallet

coinFlip(bool,uint256).details: Flip the coin, setting the bet amount and the side of the coin A request will be sent to the SupraOracles contract to get a random number

refundGame(uint256).details: Refund the game to the player. To use only if some game is stuck.

withdrawTokens(uint256).details: Withdraw tokens from the contract to the admin wallet

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.
